timeline.bodyText: The name 'MIXED_MODE' is a little generic; it would be better if it mentioned 'references'.
timeline.author: keithc-ca

replies.bodyText: Fixed (along with the java final variable).
replies.author: gacholio

timeline.author: keithc-ca

timeline.bodyText: Is interp_flagsInClassSlot another of those flags that can't be turned off?
timeline.author: keithc-ca

replies.bodyText: Yes - I'm not fixing anything to do with this in this PR.
replies.author: gacholio

replies.bodyText: That's fine with me; I just wanted to be sure that the removal of the test of interp_flagsInClassSlot was intended and will be safe.
replies.author: keithc-ca

timeline.message:
Runtime compressed refs work

Get DDR working in mixed mode.

[ci skip]

Signed-off-by: Graham Chapman <graham_chapman@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: Since you removed the test of interp_flagsInClassSlot below, perhaps you should remove it here too?
timeline.author: keithc-ca
